turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, how are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hello, I am doing fine.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am here on behalf of Save the Children, have you ever heard of this organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, what is it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international non-governmental ogranization that promotes children's rights, provides relief, and helps support children in developing countries. Have you ever donated to any international children charities?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I have donated to a few before.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great to hear! We are here looking to see if you would be interested in donating part or all of your incoming payment for this task to our organization! Your donation would go directly to helping children receive food and education in locations where they are in desperate need of help. Would this be something you would be interested in?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, this sounds good. Is there a specific or minimum amount necessary?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great! Thank you! There is no minimum amount necessary, whatever you feel like you would like to donate to go towards the cause.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would be interested in donating $0.10 of my payment to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you! We appreciate that! Is there a certain area that you are passionate about that you would like to see the donation go towards?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would love if it can go towards children in war-torn regions like Syria.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's a great cause to donate to, we have a team working with them now getting them healthy food they need in their time of need. While I have you here would you also like to be signed up for our email newsletter? That way you can stay up to date on what we are working on and any current needs we may have.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No thank you, I would rather just follow your social media. What sites are you available on, if any?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You can find us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, and even Youtube. Here is a link to our Facebook account if you wouldl ike to check us out and give us a follow!  URL

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you. Are you doing anything regarding the situation with children at the US Border?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We are working hard with protecting the children experiencing the events happening at the U.S. Border. You can read about any updates and any other causes we are working towards on our website,  URL

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I see on your site that almost 90% of donations go straight towards your programs. That is very good, I can feel better knowing my money is used right.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Definitely, and we thank you again for donating. Just to confirm you wanted to donate $0.10 of your payment for this task today, is that correct?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, $0.10 is correct.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you and have a great night, we hope to see you again soon.
